tool_description: Safe webpage retrieval from approved domains with multiple output formats (text, markdown, PDF)

available_commands.description: Fetch webpage content in specified format (text, markdown, or pdf)
List all approved domains that can be fetched

tool_usage_guidance: Use web_fetch to retrieve webpage content from approved domains
Default format is 'text' - omit second argument for plain text extraction
Use 'markdown' format to preserve document structure and links
Use 'pdf' format for visual fidelity (requires playwright)
Check approved domains first using list_domains command
Only pages from whitelisted domains can be fetched
JS-heavy sites (Reddit, Twitter) work best with playwright installed
Without playwright, static HTML sites work better than dynamic sites
proactive_triggers: When you need to retrieve information from a specific webpage
When user asks you to fetch or read a web page
When you need documentation from approved sites
When researching a topic and need original source material
When user provides a URL and asks about its content

metadata.notes: Domain whitelist ensures safe retrieval. Supports text, markdown, and PDF formats.
